query:
fragment CoreTeam on Team {
  id
  name
  acronym
  imageUrl
  nationality
  foundedAt
  imageUrlDarkMode
  imageUrlLightMode
  youtube
  twitter
  facebook
  instagram
  discord
  website
  __typename
}

fragment CorePlayer on Player {
  id
  nickName
  firstName
  lastName
  imageUrl
  birthday
  nationality
  position
  stream
  youtube
  twitter
  facebook
  instagram
  discord
  __typename
}

fragment CoreGamePlayer on GamePlayer {
  id
  side
  gameId
  championId
  position
  gameVersion
  kills
  deaths
  assists
  items
  spells
  runes {
    primary
    sub
    __typename
  }
  perk {
    primary {
      style
      selections
      __typename
    }
    sub {
      style
      selections
      __typename
    }
    stats {
      offense
      flex
      defense
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  mvpPoint
  creepScore
  minionsKilled
  wardsPlaced
  sightWardsBought
  visionWardsBought
  level
  goldEarned
  goldSpent
  totalUnitsHealed
  totalHeal
  largestMultiKill
  largestKillingSpree
  physicalDamageDealt
  physicalDamageDealtToChampions
  physicalDamageTaken
  magicDamageDealt
  magicDamageDealtToChampions
  magicDamageTaken
  trueDamageDealt
  trueDamageDealtToChampions
  trueDamageTaken
  totalDamageDealt
  totalDamageDealtToChampions
  totalDamageTaken
  totalTimeCrowdControlDealt
  largestCriticalStrike
  doubleKills
  tripleKills
  quadraKills
  pentaKills
  inhibitorsKilled
  neutralMinionsKilled
  neutralMinionsEnemyJungleKilled
  neutralMinionsTeamJungleKilled
  playersKilled
  turretsKilled
  wardsKilled
  firstBloodAssist
  firstBloodKill
  firstInhibitorAssist
  firstInhibitorKill
  firstTowerAssist
  firstTowerKill
  frames {
    position {
      x
      y
      __typename
    }
    timestamp
    __typename
  }
  skillLevelUps {
    skillSlot
    levelUpType
    __typename
  }
  itemPurchases {
    type
    itemId
    timestamp
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment CoreGameTeam on GameTeam {
  team {
    ...CoreTeam
    __typename
  }
  side
  bans
  kills
  deaths
  assists
  towerKills
  inhibitorKills
  heraldKills
  dragonKills
  elderDrakeKills
  baronKills
  goldEarned
  __typename
}

fragment CoreGame on Game {
  id
  beginAt
  endAt
  status
  detailedStats
  finished
  length
  winner {
    ...CoreTeam
    __typename
  }
  teams {
    ...CoreGameTeam
    frames {
      gold
      xp
      timestamp
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  players {
    ...CoreGamePlayer
    team {
      ...CoreTeam
      __typename
    }
    player {
      ...CorePlayer
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  objectKills {
    teamId
    objectType
    objectSubType
    timestamp
    __typename
  }
  wardTimeline {
    timestamp
    wardMap {
      x
      y
      wardType
      teamId
      playerDistances {
        playerId
        distance
        __typename
      }
      closestPlayer {
        playerId
        distance
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

query GetGameByMatch($matchId: ID!, $set: Int) {
  gameByMatch(matchId: $matchId, set: $set) {
    ...CoreGame
    __typename
  }
}
